subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Matt Flynn, who threw for 480 yards and 6 scores against Detroit in the 2011 season finale, had an ugly stat line Thursday, with no touchdowns, two fumbles, an interception and seven sacks.
snippet: Matt Flynn, who threw for 480 yards and 6 scores against Detroit in the 2011 season finale, had an ugly stat line Thursday, with no touchdowns, two fumbles, an interception and seven sacks.
